Thanks man everyone this is the spider-man game that came out in 2001 not the movie one also when it has finished downloading you just click on SpideyPC [[SAIF]].exe in the [[SPIDER MAN]] Folder and it will play the game you do not need to burn it on a DVD or anything you just click on it and it will play the game okay i hope this solved any problems you were having with it see ya.
